message:
Menu:Soft White Cheese & Walnut Dip - A delicious dip of walnuts, feta, yoghurt, parsley and olive oil. Served with toasts.
Cheddar & Nigella Seed Biscuits with Spiced Green Apple - Rich, delicious, refreshing. Homemade crackers served with a Granny Smith, cider vinegar, garlic and chilli chutney/dip.

Tropical Summer Rolls with Sambal - Rice paper rolls stuffed with snow peas, pea shoots, daikon, carrot, shiitake mushrooms, basil, cilantro and mint, with a spicy sweet sambal and soy dipping sauce.
Merguez Sausage Sandwiches with Sweet & Sour Onions - Homemade Turkish bread filled with homemade spicy lamb sausage, blacked red peppers and onions slowly cooked in sugar and sherry vinegar.

Cha Siu Thai Chicken - Chicken marinated in a sweet chilli sauce and then pan fried and served room temperature with cucumber, tomato, carrots, red onion, coriander and a ginger-soy-tomato dressing.
Summer Vegetable Medley - A delightful mix of blanched corn, asparagus, peas, beans, zucchini, fennel, peppers, radishes, fresh mozzarella and then tossed in a lemon and mint dressing.
Spinach Orzo - An accompaniment or on its own. A room temperature dish of orzo, spinach, dill, scallions, cos lettuce, parsley and a touch of lemon.

Do we have any pre-regs yet?  Have you considered 1 July as an alternate date?  I know we've had some success being the "after-party" for 2600...  (But that is 4 July weekend, so maybe people will be leaving the city fri. night.)
I haven't added this to eventbrite yet, we may have to move the date to work with groupon too.
The Roof Gala is postponed. Stay tuned for the new date.
